channel.title: Admins in safe wildy
channel.description: I have a safe wildy you dont lose items but admins are unattackable everywhere in server since they can ::pickup. And when they die from monsters they dont lose their shit. I want it to be so there only attackble in safe wildy by other admins. And they can only attack other admins. They already keep there stuff but how do i make it so they can only be attacked by other admins and they dont drop stuff.

item.title: Admins in safe wildy
item.dc:creator: @coco_zezima coco zezima
item.description:
@coco_zezima wrote:

I think i know the code but can you explain it a little to me…

Read full topic

item.title: Admins in safe wildy
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Make it so that when you’re in the wildy, the game checks for playerRights when attacking another player.

Sorry it took so long. Warning - while you were typing a new reply has been posted. You may wish to review your post. And on top of that,

zane02:

Well there isnt a way to make it where they can “ONLY” be attacked by another admin. Either you make them attackable by all players, or

I do believe you are wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Admins in safe wildy
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

Well there isnt a way to make it where they can “ONLY” be attacked by another admin. Either you make them attackable by all players, or
you make them un-attackable by all players. You can pick between the lines. So you should just pick which is more important. So bottom line
you shouldnt really make it where admins can attack because its an unfair advantage.

Example:
they hit harder.
they have unfair items.
they will ban players who kill them.

Read full topic
